name: Deadly forest: shelter survival (Android)
description:
You find yourself at a shelter in the forest surrounded by monsters that are attacking your shelter every night, You need to collect resources and find survivors at day to be able to defend your shelter at night.

The game is available to play on Google Play.

A game made by a team of four: 2 Programmers and 2 Artists.

I took the AI side with programming some gameplay aspects of the game.
